name: 王耀德
objective:
讓同學了解電磁學之基本觀念與應用，全學年課程內容將包括：
上學期：1.向量分析 2.靜電學 3.靜磁學 4.物質內的電、磁場
下學期：5.時變場與守恆律 6.電磁波 7.傳輸線及應用 8.波導與共振腔
schedule:
week 1: Review of Electrostatics and Magnetostatics
week 2~5: Electrodynamics
week 6: Conservation Laws
week 7~9: Electromagnetic Waves
(week 8 or 9: midterm exam.)
week 10~13: Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines
week 14~17: Waveguides and Cavity Resonators
week 18: final exam.
scorePolicy:
quizzes: 15% x 2
midterm: 25%
final: 25%
homeworks and homework tests: 20%
participation: extra 10%
materials:
main text: Introduction to Electrodynamics, 3rd ed., by David J. Griffiths
for applications and practices: Field and Wave Electromagnetics, 2nd ed., by David K. Cheng
